worst game ever. out of all my hours of playing this toxic game. it is the worst game though out the whole steam. i really hope dbd will closed soon or die off. i hope this game will be forgotten.

you cant have fun no matter what you do in this game. being a killer and getting swarm by surivors in end game. or being tunnel to death. no matter what. you wont have fun one way or the other. do not buy this game. it will force you into high stress, anger/rage. this is the only game i had the most stress/anger at becase its mostly either a long grind, pay to win perks. or just really god awful matches that will make you upset. a lot.

The perfect game to:
Rage.
Get frustrated.
Get camped.
Get unfair hits.
Break your keyboard and almost punch your screen.
Get sad because you got anahilated by a full team against you.
Get sad because you got anahilated by your team incompetence against you.
Get bugs.
Get game-breaking bugs.
Get fun bugs.
Get unfair bugs.
Get VERY unfair bugs.
Lag.
And the list goes on, yet you're probably gonna come back to play it every now and then because you got addicted to it like a drug.
